agencyLanding.banner_subtitle: We provide precise, comprehensive title solutions in coastal regions. Our accuracy and world-class service give our clients a competitive edge in real estate transactions.
agencyLanding.about_subtitle: We're committed to providing precise and comprehensive title solutions.
agencyLanding.about_quote: We're dedicated to giving our clients a competitive edge in their real estate transactions.
agencyLanding.expertise_subtitle: A successful transaction requires precision and expertise.
agencyLanding.expertise_paragraph: We offer the resources and expertise to support your real estate transactions. Whether you're buying, selling, or refinancing, we’ve got you covered with our top-notch title services.
agencyLanding.cta_title: Ready to get started with Coastal Title Solutions?
agencyLanding.cta_subtitle: We’re here to provide you with the title solutions you need.
agencyLanding.office_head_address: 550 N Reo St, Suite 300, Tampa, FL 33609
agencyLanding.footer_paragraph: At Coastal Title Solutions, we're committed to providing our clients with precise, comprehensive title solutions.

mediaLanding.media_subtitle: Explore our media gallery showcasing our work and events.

0.title: Title Search
0.description: Conducting thorough title searches to verify property ownership, identify any existing liens, encumbrances, or title defects.

1.title: Insurance Policies
1.description: Offering title insurance policies to protect homebuyers and lenders against potential financial losses due to title issues.

2.title: Escrow Services
2.description: Facilitating escrow services to securely hold funds during the real estate transaction until all conditions are met.

3.title: Title Clearance
3.description: Assisting in resolving title issues, such as clearing unpaid liens or resolving ownership disputes, to ensure a clean title.

4.title: Document Recording
4.description: Submitting legal documents to the appropriate government offices for official recording and public recordation.

5.title: Property Reports
5.description: Providing detailed property reports, including chain of title, tax information, and other relevant property details.

6.title: Mobile Closings
6.description: Offering mobile closing services for added convenience, allowing closings to take place at a location preferred by the parties involved.

7.title: Notary Services
7.description: Providing licensed notary services for the notarization of important legal documents related to the real estate transaction.
